page-index-activity-description: Ethereum shi ne babban dandamali don bayarwa, sarrafawa, da daidaita kadarorin dijital. Daga kuɗin da aka mayar da shi zuwa alamomi da kayan aikin kuɗi zuwa kadarorin duniya da kasuwanni masu tasowa, Ethereum yana samar da ingantaccen tushe, mai tsaka-tsaki don tattalin arzikin dijital.
page-index-activity-subtitle: Ayyuka a kan Ethereum Mainnet da hanyoyin sadarwa na Layer 2
page-index-bento-header: Sabon hanyar yin amfani da intanet
page-index-bento-assets-content: Daga zane-zane zuwa gidaje da kadarori zuwa hannayen jari, ana iya mayar da kowace kadara zuwa alama a kan Ethereum don tabbatarwa da kuma tantance mallaka ta hanyar dijital. Saya, sayarwa, ciniki, da ƙirƙirar kadarori da abubuwan tattarawa—kowane lokaci, a ko'ina.
page-index-bento-dapps-content: Manhajojin da aka gina a kan Ethereum suna aiki ba tare da sayar da bayananku ba. Daga kafofin watsa labarun zuwa wasanni zuwa aiki, yi amfani da asusu ɗaya don kowace sabuwar manhaja yayin da kake kiyaye sirri da damar shiga.
page-index-bento-defi-content: Ranta, ba da rance, sami riba, da ƙari, ba tare da asusun banki ba. Tsarin kuɗi na Ethereum wanda aka rarraba yana buɗe 24/7 ga duk wanda ke da haɗin intanet.
page-index-bento-defi-title: Tsarin kuɗi wanda yake buɗe ga kowa
page-index-bento-networks-content: An gina ɗaruruwan hanyoyin sadarwa na Layer 2 akan Ethereum. Ji daɗin ƙananan kudade da ma'amaloli na kusa da nan take yayin da kake amfana daga tabbataccen tsaro na Ethereum.
page-index-bento-stablecoins-content: Stablecoins kuɗaɗe ne da ke kiyaye farashi mai tsayayye, wanda aka daidaita da kadarori masu tsayayye kamar dalar Amurka. Samun damar biyan kuɗi na duniya nan take ko adana daraja a cikin dalar dijital akan Ethereum.
page-index-bento-stablecoins-title: Kuɗin dijital don amfanin yau da kullun
page-index-builders-description: Ethereum wani gida ne na katafariyar fasahar Web3 kuma babbar maɓuɓɓugar gudanar da kadarorin dijital. Yi amfani da JacaScript da Python, ko kukoyi yadda za ku yi amfani da fasahar yare kamar su Solidity ko Vyper don tsara manhajarku.
page-index-builders-header: Mafi girman al'ummar haɓaka fasahar Bulokcen
page-index-community-description-1: Ɗaruruwan masu fassara, masu tsara ɗalasimai, masu yin tsari, marubuta da zaratan mambobin al'umma ne suke haɓaka shafin intanet ɗin ethereum.org a kowane wata.
page-index-community-description-2: Ku zo ku yi tambayoyi, ku sadu da mutane a sassan duniya kana ku ba da gudunmowa ga shafin na intanet. Za ku sami ilimi da ya dace kuma za a nuna maku yadda komai ya ke a yayin aiwatar da tsarin!
page-index-community-description-3: Al'ummar Ethereum.org shine wurin da ya fi dacewa a fara kuma a koya.
page-index-description: Dandalin da ke jagorantar ƙirƙirarrun manhajoji da cibiyoyin bulokcen
page-index-developers-code-example-descr: Samar da bankin da tunaninku ke ƙarfafa ma wa
Ƙirƙiri kadarorin dijital waɗanda za ku iya yin tiransifa tare da amfani da su a dukkan manhajoji
Yi amfani da harsunan da ake da su a halin yanzu don yin hulɗa da Ethereum da sauran manhajoji
Sake yin tunani game da ayyukan da ke wanzuwa a matsayin waɗanda aka saki, buɗaɗɗun manhajoji
page-index-events-action: Duba dukkan abubuwan da ke faruwa
page-index-events-subtitle: Al'ummar Ethereum na gudanar da abubuwan da ke faruwa a duk faɗin duniya, duk tsawon shekara
page-index-hero-image-alt: Misali na birnin gaba, na wakiltar yanayin muhallin Ethereum.
page-index-join-action-contribute-descri: Duba dukkan hanyoyi mabambanta da za ku iya taimakawa ethereum.org wajen haɓaka da ƙara inganci.
page-index-join-action-discord-descripti: Don yin tambayoyi, haɗo gudunmowa da shiga kiraye-kirayen al'umma.
page-index-join-action-github-descriptio: Ba da gudunmowa wajen ƙirƙirar ɗalasimai, tsari, maƙaloli, da sauransu.
page-index-join-action-twitter-descripti: Don ci gaba da adana sabbin bayananmu da muhimman labarai.
page-index-join-description: Dubban masu fassara, masu rubuta lambar kwamfuta, masu ƙira, marubuta, da membobin al'umma ne suka gina kuma suke kula da gidan yanar gizon ethereum.org. Kuna iya ba da shawarar gyare-gyare ga kowane abun ciki a wannan rukunin yanar gizon mai buɗaɗɗen tushe.
page-index-join-action-hub: Cibiyar masu ba da gudummawa ta ethereum.org
page-index-learn-description: Ethereum cibiyar sadarwa ce ta blockchain mai rarraba da dandamali na haɓaka software, wanda kuɗin intanet na ether (ETH) ke ƙarfafa shi. Waɗannan albarkatun sune ƙofarku don kewaya da gaba gaɗi, fahimta, da amfani da Ethereum.
page-index-what-is-ethereum-description-: Ethereum cibiyar sadarwa ce ta blockchain mai rarraba, mai buɗaɗɗen tushe da dandamali na haɓaka software, wanda kuɗin intanet na ether (ETH) ke ƙarfafa shi. Ethereum shine amintaccen tushe na duniya don sabon ƙarni na aikace-aikacen da ba za a iya dakatar da su ba.
Cibiyar sadarwar Ethereum a buɗe take ga kowa: ba a buƙatar izini. Ba shi da mai shi, kuma dubban mutane, kungiyoyi, da masu amfani a duk duniya ne suka gina shi kuma suke kula da shi.
page-index-what-is-ether-description-1: Ether (ETH) shine kuɗin intanet na asali wanda ke ƙarfafa cibiyar sadarwar Ethereum, ana amfani da shi don biyan kuɗin ma'amala da kuma tabbatar da blockchain ta hanyar staking.
page-index-what-is-ether-description-2: Bayan rawar da yake takawa ta fasaha, ETH kuɗi ne na dijital mai buɗewa, wanda za'a iya tsarawa. Ana amfani da shi don biyan kuɗi na duniya, a matsayin jingina don lamuni, da kuma a matsayin ma'ajin daraja wanda baya dogara ga kowace cibiya ta tsakiya.
page-index-meta-description: Ethereum dandamali ne na duniya, wanda aka raba shi don kuɗi da sabbin nau'ikan manhajoji. A kan Ethereum, za ku iya rubuta lambar da ke sarrafa kuɗi, da gina manhajoji da za a iya samun dama a ko'ina cikin duniya.
page-index-meta-title: Ethereum.org: Cikakken Jagora zuwa fahimtar Ethereum
page-index-network-stats-total-eth-stake: Tabbatar da tsaro da amincin Ethereum
page-index-network-stats-tx-day-descript: Ma'amulolin da aka yi cikin sa'o'i 24 da suka gabata
page-index-network-stats-value-defi-desc: Jimillar Kuɗaɗen da aka garƙame a dandalolin hada-hadar kuɗaɗen bulokcen
page-index-network-stats-total-value-hel: Jimillar Kuɗaɗen da aka riƙe a Ethereum
page-index-popular-topics-action: Ƙarin jagorori a Cibiyar Koyo ta Ethereum
page-index-posts-action: Karanta ƙarin bayani a waɗannan shafukan intanet
page-index-posts-subtitle: Wallafe-wallafen kwanan nan da sabbin bayanai daga al'umma
page-index-values-ownership-legacy-conte: Tare da banki na yau da kullun ko dandalin sada zumunta, ƙungiyar ke sarrafa kadarorin ku da bayanan ku. Kun dogara gare su don samun damar shiga da sarrafawa.
Za a iya amfani da bayananka a hanyoyin da ba lallai ka amince da ita ba, bisa dokokin su.
page-index-values-ownership-ethereum-con: Tare da Ethereum, kaɗai ku ke da damar shiga da sarrafawa. Babu wanda zai taɓa iya amfani da kadarorin ku. Kuna iya yanke shawarar wanda za ku na ba da wannan damar.
page-index-values-fairness-legacy-conten: Yau, ba kowane ke da damar samun ayyuka na kuɗi ba. Wasu mutanen na iya fuskantar bambance-bambance wajen samun saboda wurin da suke ko kuma ƙasar su.
page-index-values-fairness-ethereum-cont: Mun amince cewa kowa ya kamata ya samu damar samun fa'idodi daga tsarin duniya. Saisa Ethereum ke ba da damar kyauta daidai wa kowa a faɗin duniya, ko da kuwa kai waye ne k kuma daga inda ka fito.
page-index-values-privacy-legacy-content: Ba za muna tsammanin gwamnati, ƙungiyoyi, ko wani taro babba, ƙungiyoyin da ba a san su ba da su tsare mana sirri daga nasu agajin ba.
Yawancin manhajojin suna tara bayanan sirrin ka iya iyawar su don su iya samun daidaita tallace-tallacen su.
page-index-values-privacy-ethereum-conte: Al'ummar Ethereum tana girmama sirri. Kana da ƴancin amfani da manhajoji ba tare da bayyana kanka ko bayanan tuntuɓarka ba.
page-index-values-integration-legacy-con: Yawancin manhajojin suna tura ku kan ku buɗe asusu daban-daban, don ya baku wahala wajen tuna bayanan shiga da kuma na rajista.
page-index-values-integration-ethereum-c: Tare da Ethereum, kuna iya sake amfani da asusu ɗaya a cikin duka manhajojin a maimako. Ba a buƙatar yin rajista ɗai-ɗai ko.
page-index-values-decentralization-legac: Kamfanonin mamallakin ƴan kasuwa ne ɗai-ɗaiku da masu rike hannun jari.
page-index-values-decentralization-ether: Kamar dai ita kanta intanet, Ethereum ba mallakin kowa bane. Kaɗai ana raba shi ne da kuma tsara shi daidai da kowa. Ba wani mamallaki guda wanda ke sarrafa shi.
page-index-values-censorship-legacy-cont: Dandamali na zamani da kuma ƙa'idodin na yawancin canzawa. Masu riƙe hannun jari na iya tasiri akan su, masu gudanar da kamfani koma taƙurin masu iko.
page-index-values-censorship-ethereum-co: Ƙin yarda da zalunci yana cikin muhimman ka'idojin Ethereum. Ayyukansa ya kamata koyaushe ya kasance cikin adalci da rashin son kai.
Ba wata ƙasar jiha da za ta iya sarrafa Ethereum, kamfani ko wani.
page-index-values-open-legacy-content-0: Kamfanoni suna kare dukiyoyinsu na ilimi kuma ba sa rabawa. Babu wanda ke wajen kamfanin da zai iya ganin yadda abubuwa ke aiki, gyara matsaloli, ko yin ingantawa. Yana da wahala ga mutane su ƙirƙiri sabbin kayan aiki ko su tsara su.
page-index-values-open-ethereum-content-: Ethereum na kowa ne. Kowa na iya amfani na gani, amfani, da kuma inganta lamba, yana sa ya yi sauki wa kowa.
page-index-fusaka-description: Don samun sauri, mafi aminci, da kuma cibiyar sadarwar Ethereum mai sauƙin amfani |
